messages.title: Sally's pledge to work for older people to improve healthcare
Juggling work and home life - Sally Keeble's commitment to working parents
A personal message to you from Sally Keeble
messages.content: Dear Friend, I'm asking for your support to be your MP on your side at all times and talking up the things that really matter to you.

messages.title: It's a scandal that some people have to wait up to 6 weeks to see a GP
Family finances are a big concern for me. So many people have told me how hard it is to manage.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sally Keeble is committed to working to improve healthcare for older people.
Sally Keeble is committed to supporting working parents.

issues.health: Sally Keeble has made healthcare a key issue in her campaign.

housing.content: Over the last five years the Tory-led government has cut the Disability Living Allowance, Tax-Aid benefit changes, and bedroom tax, negatively impacting families. Sally has given a tax cut to people earning over £150,000.

leaflet.personalStatement: You face a clear choice this May. At the General Election you will be able to choose an MP who will work tirelessly for you and understand about the pressures that face families here.

politicalExperience.achievements: Sally Keeble is a seasoned campaigner with a record of listening and taking up your concerns.

images.caption: Sally with Samantha, Steve and their children in Abington.
